name: T - Caroline Kate
_source: speak;Caroline; You're Kate, right?{w} The leader of the Dawn Brigade?
speak;Kate; I do believe that's what I said.
speak;Caroline; After this is all done, I need a talk with you about merging our groups together.
speak;Kate; Then wait until it's <bconvo>all done</>.{w} What fool tries to negotiate in the middle of battle?{w} Just fight and save the talk for later!
speak;Caroline; Great, this one has an attitude problem too.
